copy_block.description: Logitech G pioneered wireless innovation for over a decade to bring you the LIGHTSPEED Wireless Collection.We aimed to solve the fundamental challenges of wireless: latency, connectivity, and power. With three revolutionary technologies–LIGHTSPEED, POWERPLAY, and HERO—we achieved our goal. Our wireless mice, with 1ms report rate, even outperform many wired gaming mice.Welcome to the new era in gaming. Welcome to the LIGHTSPEED Wireless Collection.
copy_block.title: LIGHTSPEED WIRELESS FASTER THAN WIRED

player_quote_copy_co_1669830740.playerQuotation: I love this mouse. It helps me be as precise and confident as I need to be so we can win. I use to think wireless was too slow for gaming, but now I am on the world stage completely confident in the performance of my Logitech G LIGHTSPEED wireless mouse.

player_quote_copy_co_2130441287.playerQuotation: You have to be confident in the way you play, how you react and the gear that connects you to the game. Using the G903 with LIGHTSPEED wireless keeps me confident that I can react fast, precisely and win.

player_quote_copy.playerQuotation: Using a LIGHTSPEED wireless mouse keeps me free from cables and confident that I have the gear that is going deliver pure performace to help me win.

copyblock.mainDescription: The fully wireless desktop experience has arrived. The LIGHTSPEED Wireless Collection from Logitech G provides the most advanced gaming features with next-gen wireless performance, rock-solid connectivity and incredibly long battery life. G603 gaming mouse, G613 gaming keyboard and G533 gaming headset combine to provide the complete the wireless desktop solution.

copy_block_copy.description: From the world-renowned G903 and G703 to the unprecedented G603 with all-new HERO sensor, Logitech G has perfected the wireless gaming mouse. Take your pick. They are all winners. Just ask esports pros, like Autimatic and Bjergsen. G903 and G703 are POWERPLAY compatible.
copy_block_copy.title: LIGHTSPEED MICE

copyblock.mainDescription: Featured in G603, HERO (High-Efficiency Rated Optical) sensor is a technological breakthrough that provides both the extreme performance and incredible efficiency that wireless gamers demand. With 10x the power efficiency of previous generations, HERO is capable of delivering 12,000 DPI, 400 IPS and 500-hour battery life for G603.

testimonial.quotation: "Logitech G wireless device are now just as quick as well-respected wired mice."

testimonial_1377899279.quotation: "The G603 is easily as precise and responsive as the best wired mice I’ve ever used."

testimonial_317325741.quotation: "The Logitech G903's the best mouse you can buy....The wireless performance is flawless, and cables are a nuisance."

copyblock.mainDescription: The first of its kind. A revolutionary new wireless technology. POWERPLAY wireless charging system is able to continuously deliver power to the mouse—both while at rest and at play. The result: your G903 or G703 LIGHTSPEED wireless gaming mouse never runs out of power. Experience next-level wireless gaming with freedom, speed, precision, and infinite power of Logitech G.

testimonial_1377899279.quotation: "Once I was up and running, the combination of LIGHTSPEED and POWERPLAY made for a revolutionary mousing experience."

testimonial.quotation: "Powerplay feels like the last piece of the puzzle, the tipping point where wireless truly starts to replace wired.experience."

testimonial_317325741.quotation: "POWERPLAY generates an electromagnetic field that charges its high-end gaming mouses such as the G903. No docking, no battery swaps—just scrollin’ scrollin’ scrollin'."

copyblock.mainDescription: G613 wireless gaming keyboard is fully-equipped with Romer-G mechanical switches, macro programming, dedicated media controls and all the advanced features you need. G613 is also completely wireless with 18-month battery life, making it unlike any other gaming keyboard. The truly high-performance wireless mechanical keyboard is here, made possible by LIGHTSPEED wireless gaming technology.

copy_block_copy.description: DTS® Headphone:X™ positional surround sound. Check. Booming bass and crystal-clear highs from hybrid mesh Pro-G™ drivers. Check. Fold-away mics with micro pop-filter. Check. Incredible battery life and wireless range. Checklist complete.
copy_block_copy.title: WIRELESS SURROUND

testimonial_copy.quotation: "The G533 is probably the best-sounding wireless headset at this price."

media_tile_125147560.featureTitle: Track the G dialogue with players, fans and pros. We’re listening to provide support and elevate equality.

media_tile_1768067164.featureTitle: What you see is what you get: purist gear, eSports pros, gaming truth...See more G. Play more, G.
